## AbstractDevice.createIndexBuffer() method

Creates an index buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
createIndexBuffer(data: Uint16Array<ArrayBuffer> | Uint32Array<ArrayBuffer>, options?: BufferCreationOptions): IndexBuffer;
```
